### Notice of Request for Proposal: Camp Support Services

### Notice Number
WS4483701069

### Title
Camp Support Services - BC, AB, SK, and MB

### Tender Closing Date
July 3, 2024, 2:00 pm EDT

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the provision of Camp Support Services (CSS) in support of Operation LENTUS. The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks as-and-when requested and authorized contracted services for the provision of CSS, including goods, materials, personnel, labour, services, and maintenance to provide catering/food services and accommodation support services. This includes, but is not limited to:

- Catering/food services
- Accommodation support services
- Laundry services
- Portable shower and toilet services
- Camp lighting services
- Waste management services

These services may be required at remote base camps established by DND in British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba in response to natural emergencies.

### Period of the Requirement
The requirement will be from contract award to March 31, 2025.

### Delivery and Location
Delivery of CSS services will be required in remote base camps in British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba.

### Contracting Entity and End User Entity
The contracting entity for this RFP is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC). The end user entity for these services is the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact Diane Warnell at diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Notice URL
To access the RFP, please visit: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20078359?extsite=MjAwNzgzNTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

Please note that this is an urgent notice, and all required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by the tender closing date to be considered responsive.

### Important Dates

* Tender closing date: July 3, 2024, 2:00 pm EDT
* Contract award date: To be determined
* Period of the requirement: From contract award to March 31, 2025

Please ensure to read the RFP document carefully and in its entirety for full details on the requirements and instructions for submitting a bid. We look forward to receiving your proposal.  [1]END OF NOTICE. [1]https://discovery
